blogPost.title: Robinhood Play Store listing went from 329K reviews to 180K in few hours

localize.title: Robinhood Play Store上市几小时内从329K评论到18万。
Robinhood Play Store上市幾小時內從329K評論到18萬。

previous.excerpt:
Hi all, I have a question.

Cannabis companies Tilray and Aphria are slated to merge, forming the largest
global cannabis company by revenue by the end of Q2.
[https://www.marketwatch.com/story/tilray-stock-rockets-after-reverse-merger-deal-with-aphria-to-create-largest-global-cannabis-company…
previous.title: TLRY and APHA: Potential arbitrage opportunity?

localize.title: TLRY和APHA：潜在的套利机会？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
大家好，我有个问题。

大麻公司Tilray和Aphria计划合并，形成最大的。
到第二季度末，按收入计算的全球大麻公司。
[https://www.marketwatch.com/story/tilray-stock-rockets-after-reverse-merger-deal-with-aphria-to-create-largest-global-cannabis-company...

localize.title: TLRY和APHA：潛在的套利機會？
